value:
We are in the midst of a war—yet this
castle remains at peace. It's enough
to make one lose a sense of purpose.

My own world was also filled with
suffering, but we had a guiding light. I
vowed my life and honor to that light.

If a man's convictions are unbending,
his mind will break instead.$k$pIt's the job of a general to repair that
damage.

Training for battle is admirable. I
would be pleased to spar with you,
should you wish to go one-on-one.

My name is Zelgius. I once hid my
name, but there is no longer need.
I have moved on, and so has time.

I bring wishes for continuing good
health from your trusted comrade,
$Nf.

A glimmer of good fortune, I
suppose.
Good enough.
Pitiful.

If this power means you desire
more from me in battle, you shall
be satisfied, and soon.

I am Zelgius. As a general, I fought
for two different realms. Now, I serve
you. We shall see for how long.

Here to check on me, are you? I am
surprised you'd spare time for
someone like me. How generous.$k$pI have seen the way you cut to the
heart of the matter, and deliver even
the cruelest order without hesitation...$k$pYour rationality befits the battlefield.
But, $Nu...$k$pYou are still young. Do not rush.
Results are not everything, and you
will find your own answers in time.$k$pIt is sometimes only possible to
realize how precious something is
until after you've lost it.$k$pYou may do what you want with this
advice. However, if ever you cannot
see the road ahead...$k$pI will cleave a path for you with my
blade—straight through your
enemies.$k$pI vow this on my contract with you,
and on my holy sword.
はぁっ！
...Pointless.
うああっ！
Impressive...
Say your prayers.
Let's see how you handle this.
No draw. No escape.
One will live. One will die.
That...settles it...
ふふっ
My name is Zelgius. I have been a general for two different countries in my time.
I've lived a long life, and have experienced much... But I've never met someone quite as unpredictable as you.
I'm a soldier. I am in no position to question the orders of my superiors.
I have spent most of my life shrouded in darkness... But at least I had a purpose.
We should focus on winning this war.
Ike... We will soon meet again.
I will become your shield. The enemy will not lay a finger on you.
Your orders.
What's your plan?
I'll keep you alive.
